about:
Hey, I'm Simone! I'm a dynamic and enthusiastic professional with a focus on game design.

While my academic background is in Biology, my heart led me to the captivating world of game development. I firmly believe that true joy lies in sharing one's creations with others, and game development serves as the ideal medium for that fulfillment.

With experience as a Media Artist, I possess proficiency not only in crafting engaging gameplay but also in graphic design, video editing, and coding.

Welcome to my creative space!
